Module LB08
Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.lobby

Class LobbyMessageGenerator

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.server.lobby.LobbyMessageGenerator
public class LobbyMessageGenerator extends Object
This class represents the generator of messages exchanged between a player and the lobby.
